name: Format Number

arguments.name: Locale(s)
arguments.description: Optional locale to use for formatting the Number, e.g. "en" or "fr". Multiple locales can be provided (as an Array of Strings) to provide a fallback locale. The default value is the runtime's locale.

arguments.name: Options
arguments.description: Optional Object for configuring the formatting of the output. See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Intl/NumberFormat/NumberFormat#locale_options for all options.

description: Format a Number using the Intl.NumberFormat API. See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Intl/NumberFormat for more information.

output.description: The Number input formatted as a String.
